title.rendered: Blue Streak Hall of Fame Committee Accepting Nominations

content.rendered:
The Blue Streak Hall of Fame Committee is currently accepting new nominations to be considered as part of the 2024 Blue Streak Hall of Fame. All nominations must be submitted by May 13, 2024.

Each year, the Blue Streak Hall of Fame honors individuals and teams for their extraordinary contributions to athletics.  The program was established to recognize and celebrate the accomplishments of outstanding athletes, coaches, administrators, and supporters. A committee composed of current and former coaches; high school administrators, community members, and current and retired athletic directors review the nominations and select the honorees. A trophy case in the lobby of the blue gym holds plaques in honor of the Hall of Fame members.

Nominations may be submitted through the Blue Streak Athletic Hall of Fame online form.
